typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as float,
		{ Gross Sales } as float,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as float,
		{ COGS } as float,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmployeeData
source(output(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		{ Product } as string,
		{ Discount Band } as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{ Manufacturing Price } as string,
		{ Sale Price } as string,
		{ Gross Sales } as string,
		{ Discounts } as string,
		{  Sales } as string,
		{ COGS } as string,
		{ Profit } as string,
		Date as string,
		{Month Number} as string,
		{ Month Name } as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
EmployeeData filter(equals(Country, 'Canada')) ~> Filter1
Filter1, source1 join(EmployeeData@Country == source1@Country,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(EmployeeData@Country),
	{Units Sold} = count(source1@{Units Sold})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Country,
		{Units Sold}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
